scripts.start: echo Use \"npm run start-server\" or \"npm run start-server-notest\" instead && npm run start-server
scripts.start-server-notest: naught start --worker-count 2 --ipc-file server/naught.ipc --pid-file server/naught.pid --log server/naught.log --stdout server/stdout.log --stderr server/stderr.log start.js
scripts.start-server: npm run tests && npm run start-server-notest
scripts.deploy: npm run tests && npm run deploy-notest
scripts.test: echo Use \"npm run tests\" instead && npm run tests
scripts.tests: standard && ava code/tests && nsp check --output checkstyle && retire
